mapper.select: SELECT * FROM events_seats es, events e, seats s, types t WHERE es.event_id = e.event_id AND es.seat_id = s.seat_id AND s.type_id = t.type_id

SELECT es.event_seat_id, e.event_id, e.event_name, s.seat_id, t.type_id, t.type_name FROM events_seats es, events e, seats s, types t WHERE es.event_id = e.event_id AND es.seat_id = s.seat_id AND s.type_id = t.type_id AND es.event_seat_id = #{id}

SELECT es.event_seat_id, e.event_id, e.event_name, s.seat_id, t.type_id, t.type_name FROM events_seats es, events e, seats s, types t WHERE es.event_id = e.event_id AND es.seat_id = s.seat_id AND s.type_id = t.type_id AND es.event_id = #{eventId}

SELECT es.event_seat_id, e.event_id, e.event_name, s.seat_id, t.type_id, t.type_name FROM events_seats es, events e, seats s, types t WHERE t.type_id = #{typeId} AND es.event_id = #{eventId} AND es.event_id = e.event_id AND es.seat_id = s.seat_id AND s.type_id = t.type_id
mapper.update: UPDATE events_seats SET event_id = #{event.id}, seat_id = #{seat.id} WHERE event_seat_id = #{id}
